title: Darooghe
author: Darooghe
content: I am looking for Instagram comment likes services. I tested so many services but nothing works!Offer some ones.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: It's easy to find likes services, but comments are a little tricky.The problem is not that these services work or not, but that the number of likes decreases during a period of time, for example after a week or a month, and the second is that your account may be banned if someone reports these services.So in short, the risks are greater than the benefits.As for services, you can ask ---> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=553914, I remember that he was providing this service.

comments.author: Darooghe
comments.body: Up..........No service is available in the Internet for this! I searched a lot!

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Darooghe on June 16, 2023, 05:10:09 AMNo service is available in the Internet for this! I searched a lot!Check buyviral online, i remember they have this kind of service. But the same as the one mentioned above the chance of likes getting removed, decreases are higher on such kind of service and getting the account banned/restricted is plausible. So do it with risk.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: I don't think it will work for a big page with thousands of comments. I've seen panels that offer such services, but the ones I tried didn't deliver the order, it gets cancelled often times. I kept wondering why panels claim they offer the service when they're not. So, along the line I read on a panel that mentioned about using the service when the targeted post generates 10 comments atmost. That way it'll be easier for the bot to track the comment. Because the comments doesn't carry link, the bot looks for the username you insert during order. You can try with smaller pages, yet it doesn't sit right especially when everyone seeking for the service use it for advertising purposes. Smaller pages won't convert like the big pages.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Darooghe on April 14, 2023, 02:41:18 PMI am looking for Instagram comment likes services. I tested so many services but nothing works!Offer some ones.Have you tried Fiverr there are over thousands of services dedicated to Instagram alone and the followers and likes are organic, but it will cost you a lot, another one worth trying and looking at is Addmefast, if you tried both services, another option is to do a contest for Instagram likes in the bounty section but your content should be Cryptocurrency related because these bounty hunters are involved in Cryptocurrency.
